name: Host_Metrics
description: The Sumo Logic App for Host_Metrics allows you to collect your EC2 instance metrics and display them using predefined search queries and Dashboards. The App provides Dashboards to display analysis of EC2 instance metrics for cpu, disk, memory, network.

children.name: 1. Host_Metrics - Summary
children.description: The Host_Metrics - Summary dashboard provides at-a-glance information about a EC2 CPU, memory, network and disk usage.
children.title: 1. Host_Metrics - Summary

panels.title: Average CPU Idle

queries.queryString: metric=CPU_Idle $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg by entity

panels.title: Overall Average CPU Load (1m, 5m, 15m)

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_LoadAvg_1min | avg by metric
$$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_LoadAvg_5min | avg by metric
$$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_LoadAvg_15min | avg by metric

panels.title: Total Free System Memory per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Mem_Free | avg by entity

panels.title: Total Used, Less Buffers and Cached Memory per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Mem_ActualUsed | avg by entity

panels.title: Disk Used Bytes per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Disk_Used

panels.title: Disk Available Bytes per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Disk_Available

panels.title: Network InByte Rate per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Net_InBytes | sum by entity | rate

panels.title: Network OutByte Rate per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Net_OutBytes | sum by entity | rate

panels.title: Average CPU Utilization

queries.queryString: metric=CPU_Sys $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg

panels.title: Average Memory Usage

queries.queryString: metric= Mem_UsedPercent $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg

panels.title: Average Inbound Connection

queries.queryString: metric= TCP_InboundTotal $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg

panels.title: Average Outbound Connections

queries.queryString: metric= TCP_OutboundTotal $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg

panels.title: Average Received Bytes

queries.queryString: metric= Net_InBytes $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg | eval _value/1024/1024

panels.title: Average Sent Bytes

queries.queryString: metric= Net_OutBytes $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg | eval _value/1024/1024

panels.title: Instances

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | count by entity, instanceType

children.name: 2. Host_Metrics - CPU
children.description: The Host_Metrics - CPU dashboard provides details information about a EC2 CPU usage.
children.title: 2. Host_Metrics - CPU

panels.title: CPU User Time per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_User | avg by entity

panels.title: Overall Average CPU User Time

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_User | avg

panels.title: CPU System Time per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_Sys | avg by entity

panels.title: Overall Average CPU System Time

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_Sys | avg

panels.title: CPU 1min Average Load per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_LoadAvg_1min*  | avg by entity

panels.title: Overall Average CPU Load (1m, 5m, 15m)

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_LoadAvg_1min | avg by metric
$$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_LoadAvg_5min | avg by metric
$$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_LoadAvg_15min | avg by metric

panels.title: CPU Idle Time per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_Idle | avg by entity

panels.title: Overall Average CPU Idle Time

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_Idle | avg

panels.title: CPU IO Wait Time per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_IOWait | avg by entity

panels.title: User time per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc metric=CPU_User account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg by entity

panels.title: System time per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc metric=CPU_Sys account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg by entity

panels.title: CPU Consumption per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc metric=CPU_LoadAvg_1min account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg by entity

children.name: 3. Host_Metrics - Memory
children.description: The Host_Metrics - Memory dashboard provides details information about a EC2 memory usage.
children.title: 3. Host_Metrics - Memory

panels.title: Total Memory per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Mem_Total | avg by entity

panels.title: Percent Memory Used per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Mem_UsedPercent | avg by entity

panels.title: Total Free, Buffers and Cached Memory per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Mem_ActualFree | avg by entity

panels.title: Total Used, Less Buffers and Cached Memory per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Mem_ActualUsed | avg by entity

panels.title: Total Free Memory per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Mem_Free | avg by entity

panels.title: Total Used System Memory per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Mem_Used | avg by entity

panels.title: Memory Used Percentage per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc metric=Mem_UsedPercent account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg by entity

panels.title: Actual Memory Used Percentage per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: metric=Mem_ActualUsed $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}}
$$metricsrc metric=Mem_Total account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}}
(#A/#B)*100 as ActualUsedPercentage | avg by entity

children.name: 4. Host_Metrics - Disk
children.description: The Host_Metrics - Disk dashboard provides details information about a EC2 Disk usage.
children.title: 4. Host_Metrics - Disk

panels.title: Disk Used Bytes per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Disk_Used

panels.title: Disk Available Bytes per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Disk_Available

panels.title: Disk Read Rate per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Disk_Reads | sum by entity | rate

panels.title: Disk Read Byte Rate per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Disk_ReadBytes | sum by entity | rate

panels.title: Disk Write Rate per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Disk_Writes | sum by entity | rate

panels.title: Disk Write Byte Rate per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Disk_WriteBytes | sum by entity | rate

panels.title: Used Percentage per Directory

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc metric=Disk_UsedPercent account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg by entity, DirName

panels.title: Writes per Directory

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc metric=Disk_Writes account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg by entity, DirName

children.name: 5. Host_Metrics - Network
children.description: The Host_Metrics - Network dashboard provides details information about a EC2 Network activities based on In and out packets, bytes.
children.title: 5. Host_Metrics - Network

panels.title: Network InPacket Rate per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Net_InPackets | sum by entity | rate

panels.title: Network OutPacket Rate per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Net_OutPackets | sum by entity | rate

panels.title: Network InByte Rate per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Net_InBytes | sum by entity | rate

panels.title: Network OutByte Rate per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Net_OutBytes | sum by entity | rate

panels.title: Average In Packets per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Net_InPackets | avg by entity

panels.title: Average Out Packets per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Net_OutPackets | avg by entity

children.name: 6. Host_Metrics - TCP
children.description: The Host_Metrics - TCP dashboard provides details information about a EC2 connection details.
children.title: 6. Host_Metrics - TCP

panels.title: Inbound Connections per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=TCP_InboundTotal | avg by entity

panels.title: Outbound Connections per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=TCP_OutboundTotal | avg by entity

panels.title: Listen Connections per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=TCP_Listen | avg by entity

panels.title: Established Connections per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=TCP_Established | avg by entity

panels.title: CloseWait Connections per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=TCP_CloseWait | avg by entity

panels.title: TimeWait Connections per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=TCP_TimeWait | avg by entity

panels.title: Inbound Connections per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc metric=TCP_InboundTotal account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | sum by entity

panels.title: Outbound Connections per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc metric=TCP_OutboundTotal account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | sum by entity

children.description: The Host_Metrics - Overview dashboard provides at-a-glance information about a EC2 CPU, memory, network and disk usage.

panels.title: Network InByte Rate per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Net_InBytes | sum by entity | rate

panels.title: Network OutByte Rate per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Net_OutBytes | sum by entity | rate

panels.title: Average CPU Utilization

queries.queryString: metric=CPU_Sys $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} entity={{entity}} | avg

panels.title: Average Memory Usage

queries.queryString: metric= Net_OutBytes $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg | eval _value/1024/1024

queries.queryString: $$metricsrc  account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | count by instancetype, entity
